page.title: 10Life styles, Swainby & Potto
page.content: There is{contrast}between those whose horizons are limited to the parish and those whose finances, education and careers enable them to take a broader view. Each group has value in the community. Extremes of fashion do not feature. There are{no problems of {drug or race,and only minor vandalism. A hairdresser's shop and 2 travelling home hairdressers serve the vicinity, whilst mobile library, butcher, greengrocer and fresh-fish vans supply everyday needs. Six public houses and a restaurant/nightclub attract visitors from Teesside. This is the only public{entertainment}for the community, who tend to create their own social functions, with outings to Teesside, Northallerton or York for shopping, culture and young-people's sports. Natural beauty and scope for {leisure}are adequate compensation.
